text: Visible - Both players can see this card while it's in the story.
Fleeting - After resolving, this card is removed from the game.
Morning - At the start of each round, if this is the top card of your discard pile, trigger the following effect.
Sight X - The first X cards in the story are visible to you this round.
Inspire X - Next round you have X extra breath.
Inspire X - This round you have X extra breath.
Nourish X - The next card you resolve is worth +X points.
Birth X - If you have a Child in hand, increase its points by X. Otherwise create a 0:X Fleeting Child in hand.
